body:
Well Guys,
I've found myself a job to be a moderator on a different server and I've realized that, that server is more important than Avicus. I think I will stop by and say hi rarely or maybe even never. Now that I've found a job to be a moderator I'm saying bye. I mean this server barely has anybody so it's a start. What I'm saying right now doesn't mean I'm not coming back. 
I want to thank the people below who made Avicus a well experience for me
Players;
Izjust4delolz; Critical_Kilzz
Murph_the_cat
MeggsAndBacon
Professor_Yorvit
Alex_Morgan_13
Micahb2220O0
endertrevor
Kiawwa
xAntoniaII
Sorry if I forgot you :c 
I hope this server thrives
Mods I'm guessing are probably going to lock this thread :P

title: Less Active Here

replies.body: Not all moderators stick to only 1 server though. Feel free to come back to Avicus for some fun whenever moderating is too stressful. Good luck!
